alert.note: Alert for Adams (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:34PM CDT until May 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTY... At 1132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Rome, or 11 miles south of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... New Rome, Big Flats, The Leola Marsh Wildlife Area, Lake Arrowhead, Lake Sherwood, County Roads G And O, Lake Camelot, County Roads O And W, County Roads D And G and County Roads D And W. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
